ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwspjmhm.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | pwspjmhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |

| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fconst6g | |- ( R e. Mnd -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> Mnd ) |

| 10 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> A e. I ) |
| 11 | 3, 4, 5, 7, 9, 10 | #P_prdspjmhm | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( x e. ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |-> ( x ` A ) ) e. ( ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) MndHom ( ( I X. { R } ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` R ) = ( Scalar ` R ) |

| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 2, 15 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> B = ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_mpteq1d | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( x e. B |-> ( x ` A ) ) = ( x e. ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |-> ( x ` A ) ) ) |

| 19 | 18 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( ( I X. { R } ) ` A ) = R ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> R = ( ( I X. { R } ) ` A ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 20 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( Y MndHom R ) = ( ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) MndHom ( ( I X. { R } ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 22 | 11, 17, 21 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( x e. B |-> ( x ` A ) ) e. ( Y MndHom R ) ) |
